message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,000. It's a great deal for something worth $10,000 to you.  Let me know what you think!

Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product is $10,000 to me, so I would like to propose a price of $9,500. I hope this is within your consideration. Looking forward to your response!

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm not quite ready to go that low.  How about we split the difference and I sell it to you for $9,750? It's still a good deal for both of us. Let me know what you think.

Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the value I place on the product, I would like to counter with an offer of $9,600. I believe this strikes a fair balance between our positions. I look forward to your response.
